name: Korean Phone Number Simplified (8 digits, optional separator)
description: Korean phone number without prefix, with optional separator: 1234-5678, 1234 5678, or 12345678

name: Korean Phone Number (Flexible)
description: Korean phone number with optional country code, prefix, and separators: +82 010-1234-5678, 01012345678, +82-10-1234-5678, etc.
